roleset.name: devoted, giving liege
roleset.note: ALLEGIANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from allegiant.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: That is to say , the existing political mechanism of Syria allows Bashar to basically have a secure position , besides the tightly organized Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party being totally docile , subservient and obedient to Bashar , the existing army are largely allegiant to Syria 's current regime ,
example.arg: besides the tightly organized Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party being totally docile, subservient and obedient to Bashar
